title: Wholemeal buttermilk pancakes
ingredients: ['For the pancakes', '500ml buttermilk', '45g rolled oats', '100g wholemeal flour', '100g plain flour', '1½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon bicarbonate soda', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '25g wheatgerm', '2 eggs', '55g brown sugar', '1 tablespoon canola or sunflower oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'To serve', 'maple syrup, warmed', '2 medium bananas, sliced']
